com.krobothsoftware.psn.client

Class PlayStationNetworkClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krobothsoftware.psn.client.PlayStationNetworkClient

  • public class PlayStationNetworkClient
extends Object
    The PlayStationNetwork Client is used for all psn network related methods and info. There are three main types of data being retrieved,
    • Client - prefix for all methods that retrieved data from UK Site.
    • Public - prefix for all methods that retrieve data from US Site
    • Official - prefix for all methods that retrieved data from Sony's official servers
    Since:
    Nov 25 2012
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Kyle Kroboth

      • clientLogin

        public String clientLogin(ProgressListener progressListener,
                 String username,
                 String password)
                   throws IOException,
                          PlayStationNetworkException,
                          PlayStationNetworkLoginException
        Logs into account from credentials. First logs into UK account and uses the data in return to quietly log into US account.

        Following data is stored 

          
          
  
        • UK Cookies
       - PDC4_COOKIE (login cookie)
       - s_token (login cookie)
  
          • 
  
        • US Cookies
       - userinfo (contains PsnUserInfo data)
       - TICKET (login cookie)
       - PSNS2STICKET (login cookie)
 
          • 
  
        • PsnId (returned in method)
          • 
  
        • Jid (getOfficialJid(String) used throughout the whole library as the main identifier)
          • 
  
        • SessionId
          •

        Connections made, in order. Some may not be called if data isn't found 

         https://secure.eu.playstation.com/sign-in/confirmation/
 https://store.playstation.com/j_acegi_external_security_check?target=/external/loginDefault.action
 https://store.playstation.com/external/loginDefault.action (;jsessionid=****) is appended at end if not set
 https://secure.eu.playstation.com/sign-in/confirmation/ (?sessionId=****)
 http://us.playstation.com/uwps/HandleIFrameRequests (?sessionId=****)
 http://us.playstation.com/uwps/PSNLoginCookie?cookieName=userinfo&id= (random number)

        Methods that need UK login

        getClientFriendList()
        getClientGameList()
        getClientTrophyList(String)
        getClientFriendGameList(String)
        getClientFriendTrophyList(String, String)
        Parameters:
        progressListener - progress listener used to monitor login process
        username - username which is email
        password - password
        Returns:
        PsnId from account
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if username or password is null
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if sign in was unsuccessful. Not to be confused with username or password not correct
        PlayStationNetworkLoginException - thrown if username or password is not valid

      • getClientFriendList

        public List<PsnFriendData> getClientFriendList()
                                        throws PlayStationNetworkException,
                                               PlayStationNetworkLoginException,
                                               IOException
        Retrieves client Friend List.

        Requirements 

          
      • UK Cookies
     - PDC4_COOKIE
     - s_token
 
        •

        Connections Made 

         https://secure.eu.playstation.com/ajax/mypsn/friend/presence/
        Returns:
        friend list
        Throws:
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered
        PlayStationNetworkLoginException - thrown if login cookies were invalid or not found
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        See Also:
        PsnUtils.createLoginCookiePdc4(String), PsnUtils.createLoginCookieToken(String)

      • getClientGameList

        public List<PsnGameData> getClientGameList()
                                    throws IOException,
                                           PlayStationNetworkException,
                                           PlayStationNetworkLoginException
        Retrieves client game list.

        Requirements 

          
      • UK Cookies
     - PDC4_COOKIE
     - s_token
 
        •

        Connections Made 

         http://uk.playstation.com/psn/mypsn/trophies/
        Returns:
        client game list
        Throws:
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered
        PlayStationNetworkLoginException - thrown if login cookies were invalid or not found
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        See Also:
        PsnUtils.createLoginCookiePdc4(String), PsnUtils.createLoginCookieToken(String)

      • getClientTrophyList

        public List<PsnTrophyData> getClientTrophyList(String trophyLinkId)
                                        throws PlayStationNetworkException,
                                               PlayStationNetworkLoginException,
                                               IOException
        Retrieves client trophy list. Will return all types of trophies for given game

        Requirements 

          
      • UK Cookies
     - PDC4_COOKIE
     - s_token
 
        •

        Connections Made 

         http://uk.playstation.com/psn/mypsn/trophies/detail/?title= (Trophy Link Id)
        Parameters:
        trophyLinkId - trophy link Id
        Returns:
        client trophy list
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if invalid trophy link Id
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered
        PlayStationNetworkLoginException - thrown if login cookies were invalid or not found
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        See Also:
        PsnUtils.createLoginCookiePdc4(String), PsnUtils.createLoginCookieToken(String)

      • getClientFriendGameList

        public List<PsnGameData> getClientFriendGameList(String friendPsnId)
                                          throws IOException,
                                                 PlayStationNetworkException,
                                                 PlayStationNetworkLoginException
        Retrieves client friend game list. friendPsnId must be a valid friend.

        Requirements 

          
      • UK Cookies
     - PDC4_COOKIE
     - s_token
 
        •

        Connections Made 

         http://uk.playstation.com/psn/mypsn/trophies-compare/?friend= (friend psnId) &mode=FRIENDS
        Parameters:
        friendPsnId - friend psn id
        Returns:
        client friend game list
        Throws:
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered
        PlayStationNetworkLoginException - thrown if login cookies were invalid or not found
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        See Also:
        PsnUtils.createLoginCookiePdc4(String), PsnUtils.createLoginCookieToken(String)

      • getClientFriendTrophyList

        public List<PsnTrophyData> getClientFriendTrophyList(String friendPsnId,
                                            String trophyLinkId)
                                              throws IOException,
                                                     PlayStationNetworkException,
                                                     PlayStationNetworkLoginException
        Retrieves client friend trophy list. friendPsnId must be a valid friend.

        Requirements 

          
      • UK Cookies
     - PDC4_COOKIE
     - s_token
 
        •

        Connections Made 

         http://uk.playstation.com/psn/mypsn/trophies-compare/detail/?title= (trophy linkId) &friend= (friend psnId) &sortBy=game
        Parameters:
        friendPsnId - friend psn id
        trophyLinkId - UK trophy link id
        Returns:
        client friend trophy list
        Throws:
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered
        PlayStationNetworkLoginException - thrown if login cookies were invalid or not found
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        See Also:
        PsnUtils.createLoginCookiePdc4(String), PsnUtils.createLoginCookieToken(String)

      • getPublicGameList

        public List<PsnGameData> getPublicGameList(String psnId)
                                    throws PlayStationNetworkException,
                                           IOException
        Retrieve the public game list from US site. Note that the web site happens not to get all games for given user. Use Official or Client methods if needed.

        Requirements 

          
      • US Cookies
     - TICKET
     - PSNS2STICKET
 
        •

        Connections Made 

         http://us.playstation.com/playstation/psn/profile/ (psnId) /get_ordered_trophies_data
        Parameters:
        psnId - psn id
        Returns:
        public game list
        Throws:
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        See Also:
        PsnUtils.createLoginCookieTicket(String), PsnUtils.createLoginCookiePsnTicket(String)

      • getPublicTrophyList

        public List<PsnTrophyData> getPublicTrophyList(String psnId,
                                      String trophyLinkId,
                                      boolean getGameId)
                                        throws PlayStationNetworkException,
                                               PlayStationNetworkLoginException,
                                               IOException
        Retrieve public trophy list.

        Requirements 

          
      • US Cookies
     - TICKET
     - PSNS2STICKET
 
        •

        Connections Made 

         (getGameId == true) http://us.playstation.com/playstation/psn/profiles/ (psnId) /trophies/ (trophy linkId)
 http://us.playstation.com/playstation/psn/profile/ (psnId) /get_ordered_title_details_data
        Parameters:
        psnId - psn id
        trophyLinkId - US trophy link id
        getGameId - whether to retrieve Official game Id
        Returns:
        public trophy list
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if US trophy link Id isn't in correct format
        PlayStationNetworkLoginException - thrown if login cookies were invalid or not found
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        See Also:
        PsnUtils.createLoginCookieTicket(String), PsnUtils.createLoginCookiePsnTicket(String)

      • getPublicTrophyList

        public List<PsnTrophyData> getPublicTrophyList(String psnId,
                                      String trophyLinkId,
                                      String gameId)
                                        throws PlayStationNetworkException,
                                               PlayStationNetworkLoginException,
                                               IOException
        Retrieve public trophy list.

        Requirements 

          
      • US Cookies
     - TICKET
     - PSNS2STICKET
 
        •

        Connections Made 

         http://us.playstation.com/playstation/psn/profile/ (psnId) /get_ordered_title_details_data
        Parameters:
        psnId - psn id
        trophyLinkId - US trophy link id
        gameId - Official game Id
        Returns:
        public trophy list
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if US trophy link Id isn't right format
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered, psnId invalid, or
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        PlayStationNetworkLoginException
        See Also:
        PsnUtils.createLoginCookieTicket(String), PsnUtils.createLoginCookiePsnTicket(String)

      • getOfficialProfile

        public PsnProfileData getOfficialProfile(String jid)
                                  throws PlayStationNetworkException,
                                         IOException
        Retrieves official profile.

        Requirements 

          
      • Authorization
     - c7y-basic01 : A9QTbosh0W0D^{7467l-n_>2Y%JG^v>o
 
        • 
 Should already be set by calling init()

        Connections Made 

         http://getprof.us.np.community.playstation.net/basic_view/func/get_profile
 http://trophy.ww.np.community.playstation.net/trophy/func/get_user_info
        Parameters:
        jid - jid
        Returns:
        if found, profile, otherwise null
        Throws:
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • getOfficialFirmwareVersion

        public String getOfficialFirmwareVersion(PlatformType platform)
                                  throws IOException
        Retrieves official firmware version of platform type.

        Connections Made 

         (PS3) http://fus01.ps3.update.playstation.net/update/ps3/list/us/ps3-updatelist.txt
 (VITA) http://fus01.psp2.update.playstation.net/update/psp2/list/us/psp2-updatelist.xml
 (PSP) http://fu01.psp.update.playstation.org/update/psp/list2/us/psp-updatelist.txt
        Parameters:
        platform - platform to check firmware
        Returns:
        firmware version
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • getOfficialJid

        public String getOfficialJid(String psnId)
                      throws IOException
        Retrieves Jid for giving PsnId. Every psnId should be on the US server no matter what country.

        Requirements 

          
      • Authorization
     - c7y-basic01 : A9QTbosh0W0D^{7467l-n_>2Y%JG^v>o
 
        • 
 Should already be set by calling init()

        Connections Made 

         http://searchjid.usa.np.community.playstation.net/basic_view/func/search_jid
        Parameters:
        psnId - psn id
        Returns:
        jid
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • getOfficialGameList

        public List<PsnGameDataOfficial> getOfficialGameList(String jid,
                                            int start,
                                            int max,
                                            PlatformType... platforms)
                                              throws IOException,
                                                     PlayStationNetworkException
        Retrieves game list for Jid. Logger will show warning if max goes over 64 since it is the default limit. If no platform is given, PS3 will be used as default.

        Requirements 

          
      • Authorization
     - c7y-trophy01 : jhlWmT0|:0!nC:b:#x/uihx'Y74b5Ycx
 
        • 
 Should already be set by calling init()

        Connections Made 

         http://trophy.ww.np.community.playstation.net/trophy/func/get_title_list
        Parameters:
        jid - jid
        start - start index. Has to be one or greater.
        max - max games
        platforms - platforms for games
        Returns:
        official game list
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if start index is zero or less
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered or invalid jid

      • getOfficialTrophyList

        public List<PsnTrophyDataOfficial> getOfficialTrophyList(String jid,
                                                String gameId)
                                                  throws IOException,
                                                         PlayStationNetworkException
        Retrieves official trophy list from jid and Official game Id. If game Id is invalid a blank game list will be returned.

        Requirements 

          
      • Authorization
     - c7y-trophy01 : jhlWmT0|:0!nC:b:#x/uihx'Y74b5Ycx
 
        • 
 Should already be set by calling init()

        Connections Made 

         http://trophy.ww.np.community.playstation.net/trophy/func/get_trophies
        Parameters:
        jid - jid
        gameId - Official game id
        Returns:
        official trophy list
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if game id isn't in Official format
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered or invalid id

      • getOfficialLatestTrophyList

        public List<PsnTrophyDataOfficial> getOfficialLatestTrophyList(String jid,
                                                      int max,
                                                      PlatformType... platforms)
                                                        throws PlayStationNetworkException,
                                                               IOException
        Retrieves official latest trophy list. Logger will show warning if max goes over 64 since it is the default limit. If no platform is given, PS3 will be used as default.

        Requirements 

          
      • Authorization
     - c7y-trophy01 : jhlWmT0|:0!nC:b:#x/uihx'Y74b5Ycx
 
        • 
 Should already be set by calling init()

        Connections Made 

         http://trophy.ww.np.community.playstation.net/trophy/func/get_latest_trophies
        Parameters:
        jid - jid
        max - max amount of trophies
        platforms - platforms for trophies
        Returns:
        official trophy list
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered or invalid id

      • getOfficialTrophyListSince

        public List<PsnTrophyDataOfficial> getOfficialTrophyListSince(String jid,
                                                     int max,
                                                     String since,
                                                     PlatformType... platforms)
                                                       throws IOException,
                                                              PlayStationNetworkException
        Retrieves official trophy list from date. Logger will show warning if max goes over 64 since it is the default limit. If no platform is given, PS3 will be used as default.

        Requirements 

          
      • Authorization
     - c7y-trophy01 : jhlWmT0|:0!nC:b:#x/uihx'Y74b5Ycx
 
        • 
 Should already be set by calling init()

        Connections Made 

         http://trophy.ww.np.community.playstation.net/trophy/func/get_latest_trophies
        Parameters:
        jid - jid
        max - max amount of trophies
        since - date in format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ
        platforms - platforms for trophies
        Returns:
        the official trophy list since
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if parse error is encountered or invalid id
        See Also:
        PsnUtils.getOfficialDateFormat(java.util.Date)

      • loginUK

        public void loginUK(ProgressListener progressListener,
           String username,
           String password)
             throws IOException,
                    PlayStationNetworkException,
                    PlayStationNetworkLoginException
        Logs into UK account from credentials. This method only logs into UK account and that is all. Use this if login cookies are invalid and need new ones.

        Following data is stored 

          
          
  
        • UK Cookies
       - PDC4_COOKIE (login cookie)
       - s_token (login cookie)
  
          • 
  
        • SessionId
          •

        Connections made, in order. 

         https://store.playstation.com/j_acegi_external_security_check?target=/external/loginDefault.action
 https://store.playstation.com/external/loginDefault.action (;jsessionid=****) is appended at end if not set
 https://secure.eu.playstation.com/sign-in/confirmation/ (?sessionId=****)
        Parameters:
        progressListener - progress listener
        username - username which is email
        password - password
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if username or password is null
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if sign in was unsuccessful. Not to be confused with username or password not correct
        PlayStationNetworkLoginException - thrown if username or password is not valid
        See Also:
        clientLogin(ProgressListener, String, String)

      • loginUS

        public void loginUS(ProgressListener progressListener,
           String username,
           String password)
             throws IOException,
                    PlayStationNetworkException,
                    PlayStationNetworkLoginException
        Logs into UK account from credentials. This method only logs into US account and that is all. In the client this method is useless since clientLogin(ProgressListener, String, String) retrieves US login cookies. Plus there are methods to generate them as well. It can be used to retrieve client session Id and user info as well.

        Following data is stored 

          
          
  
        • US Cookies
       - userinfo (contains PsnUserInfo data)
       - TICKET (login cookie)
       - PSNS2STICKET (login cookie)
 
          • 
  
        • SessionId
          •

        Connections made, in order. Some may not be called if data isn't found 

         https://account.sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/external/auth/login!authenticate.action
 https://us.playstation.com/uwps/PSNTicketRetrievalGenericServlet (?sessionId=****)
 http://us.playstation.com/uwps/HandleIFrameRequests (?sessionId=****)
        Parameters:
        progressListener - progress listener
        username - username which is email
        password - password
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if username or password is null
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        PlayStationNetworkException - thrown if sign in was unsuccessful. Not to be confused with username or password not correct
        PlayStationNetworkLoginException - thrown if username or password is not valid
        See Also:
        clientLogin(ProgressListener, String, String), PsnUtils.createLoginCookieTicket(String), PsnUtils.createLoginCookiePsnTicket(String)
